title: GET_WEAPON_COMPONENT_RANGE_MODIFIER
content:
0x2FD0BC1B// GetWeaponComponentRangeModifier
float GET_WEAPON_COMPONENT_RANGE_MODIFIER(Hash componentHash);Parameters:componentHash: Weapon component name hash.Returns: A weapon component range modifier.A getter for CWeaponFallOffModifier range modifier value in a weapon component.
